name: Dominance of Earth
title: Zhongli: Dominance of Earth
desc: The vastness of rivers flows endless, perpetual upon the tapestry of eons.
in_play_description: When your Zhongli, who has this card equipped, has at least 7 HP, the DMG dealt by Zhongli and the Geo DMG from your Summons +1.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Zhongli to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Zhongli, equip this card. After Zhongli equips this card, immediately use Dominus Lapidis: Striking Stone once. When your Zhongli, who has this card equipped, has at least 7 HP, the DMG dealt by Zhongli and the Geo DMG from your Summons +1. (You must have Zhongli in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
